meanings.definition: A type of vehicle construction in which the body and frame are combined into a single unit.
meanings.sent1: The car's unibody design made it strong and durable.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic explained how the unibody structure of the car improved safety.
meanings.sent3: The unibody car and its frame danced together on the road.
meanings.sent4: Her unibody vehicle was like a seamless puzzle of strength.
meanings.sent5: The unibody construction of the car was like a shield protecting its passengers.

meanings.definition: A laptop computer with a case made from a single piece of material.
meanings.sent1: She preferred the unibody laptop for its sleek design.
meanings.sent2: The unibody MacBook was known for its elegant appearance.
meanings.sent3: The unibody laptop and its screen were inseparable.
meanings.sent4: His unibody computer was a work of art in simplicity.
meanings.sent5: The unibody case of the laptop felt smooth and sturdy in her hands.
